Name: Zombie Freaks
About the game: 20 levels of fast paced retro shooting fps action. Explore the dark tunnels of a paramilitary Siberian base. Kill the mutant zombie freaks within. Find the key to the next level of blood soaked insanity. Unleash the brutal killing machine within you. Take no prisoners.
